meta.description: This summer, the buzziest summer drinks are the ones that won't give you a buzz. Epicurious Digital Director Maggie Hoffman discusses the rise of non-alcoholic drinks and takes us through some easy drinks to make at home. For recipes, visit our "CBS Mornings" social media channels.

title: Watch CBS Mornings: Easy summer non-alcoholic drinks - Full show on CBS
